modName: Xbox 360 Controller Remapper with Controller Input
summary:
A program to remap your controller config file using your XBOX 360 controller as input.  Easy and simple to use!

Features:
-Bind actions to different keys/combination of keys
-Bind keys that are \'reserved\' (unbind-able) in the game.  (i.e., you cant bind directional pads)
descriptionHtml:
A program written in C#.net that detects and uses your XBOX 360 controller to remap your controlmap.txt file.  


[size=12]Features:[/size]
-Bind actions to different keys/combination of keys
-Bind keys that are \'reserved\' (unbind-able) in the game.  (i.e., you cant bind directional pads)


[size=12]Requirements:[/size]
Requires .NET framework version 4.0 or higher.  
[url=http://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=17851] http://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=17851[/url]

[size=12]IMPORTANT!:[/size]
This program runs fine but if you leave it open, start Skyrim and return the program, it will hang a bit when binding keys.  Just restart the program.

[size=12]How To Use:[/size]
1.  Use nexus mod manager to download or download file and extract into your \"<Skyrim directory>\\data\" folder (e.g., C:\\games\\The Elder Scrolls V Skyrim\\Data )
2.  Open Xbox Controller Remapper for Skyrim.exe
3.  Go to File->Open and open your controlmap.txt file located at your \"<skyrim directory>Data\\Interface\\Controls\\pc\\\"  (one is provided for you if you don\'t have one)
4a.  Click on the green arrow to start the binding process then
4b.  Press and hold your desire combination of buttons
5.  Save your file

[size=12]Notes:[/size]
- [b]Order of binding matters[/b].  For instance, LB + A is not the same as A + LB --> LB + A means you press LB then press A and vice versa.  This causes some problems with certain commands like \"favorites\".
- When pressing the bind key button (green arrows), the program is waiting for an input.  Either press a button on your controller or wait for it to die out.  The program is NOT hanging.
- [b]Not all key map combinations will work.[/b]  There are limitations to what and how you can bind your actions and I have no exhaustively tested everything.
- [b]Double mapping keys will cause problems.[/b]  Do not bind A + B and B + A to the same command.


[size=12]Version History:[/size]
v1.2.1 - Can now add key binds one at a time to get the right order.  (Order matters!)
v1.2.0 - Found some issues with controlmap.txt that would make certain binds not to work.  Recoded to adjust.
v1.1.1 - Changed some code to help with stability.  Fixed some minor boo boos on the form.
v1.0.1 - Small update that fixes some misplaced items on the main window
author: GNehs
